item.title: Windows 7 Home Premium changes for IIS 7.5 access of Users directories
item.description: Tweaks to allow IIS on Windows 7 Home Premium access to content within the Users directories.

item.title: Working with Virtual Hard Disks in Windows 7 and Server 2008 R2
item.description: With the new versions of Windows, Virtual Hard Disks (VHDs) are no longer just for virtualized environments.

item.title: Solved: Upgrading to Windows 7 on an HP a6360t with a second hard drive
item.description: My experience performing the initial upgrade of my HP Pavilion a6360t to Windows 7 Home Premium, 64-bit.
